changelog:
✨ Improved UI layout for module items
  📝 Added descriptions for modules
  🖌️ Added stroke/border support for modules
  🎨 Enhanced overall UI for a cleaner, more modern look

⚙️ Added settings panel
  🔧 Customizable options for better user control
  ♿ Enhanced accessibility features

🆕 Added new icons
  🖼️ Updated icons for modules and menu items
  🎯 Improved visual consistency and style

🐞 Fixed white background issue inside some dialogs

📂 Tweaked menu action items for smoother interaction

⚡ General bug fixes & optimizations
  🚀 Performance improvements
  🧹 Minor UI adjustments for a polished appearance
